name: Regionu's Accuracy
description:
Shoot the enemies and make it to the portal. You cannot touch the enemies as then you will lose. You will also lose if the enemies touch the edge of the screen. Platforms start to descend when you touch them so you will need to move fast. Your score is equal to the amount of levels you can complete in one run.

Controlls:

A & D = Movment

Space = Jump

Aim with your mouse

Leftclick = Shoot

E whilst on portal takes you to the next level

The levels are randomly generated

Good luck! :)

Made for Trijam #211.
